pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 3, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, May 3, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Prime Ministerâ€™s Awards for Teaching Excellence and will present 16 awards to teachers and early childhood educators.

Canadian Museum of Nature
240 McLeod Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
